Package ICS4UProject

Class InteractiveObjectRec

java.lang.Object
ICS4UProject.GameObject
ICS4UProject.GameObjectRec
ICS4UProject.BodyRec
ICS4UProject.CollisionBodyRec
ICS4UProject.InteractiveObjectRec
All Implemented Interfaces:
Body, CameraView, Kinetic, KineticsWithSize, PhysicsUpdate
public class InteractiveObjectRec extends CollisionBodyRec
This represents a rectangular interactive object with javafx rectangular so that objects can collide with each other
